Name: [Affinity] Muscle Mayhem
Desc: Anton has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Warm-Up Exercises]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo. Additionally, he gains the <color=#FFAF2C>Industrial Grade Motivation</color> effect. (Effective for {CReplaceCardParam:BattleCount_Card1100948,1,2} more battles).
Desc2: Anton is in excellent shape, effortlessly moving through chest exercises as if he's powered by endless energy and he's looking for a punching bag to hammer.
